parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post explicitly mentions PSD (Partidul Social Democrat) and its leader Marcel Ciolacu,  promoting them and their actions.  It also implicitly refers to other parties like USR and PNL, framing them negatively in comparison. This directly relates to "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. This is a paid Facebook post, inherently designed for wide public reach. The message is not a private communication but aims to influence a large audience. This satisfies "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The primary objective of the post is to persuade voters to support PSD in the upcoming parliamentary elections.  The post highlights PSD's achievements, contrasts them with the perceived failures of other parties, and explicitly calls for votes for PSD. This strongly suggests an electoral objective, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. While the post presents some factual information (economic data, Schengen accession), it's heavily biased and framed to promote PSD.  The presentation lacks journalistic objectivity and balance, focusing solely on aspects favorable to PSD and negatively portraying opposing parties. It's not primarily informative but persuasive.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The post goes beyond expressing a personal opinion. It uses persuasive language, statistical data (some of which may be debatable), and direct calls to action to influence voters' choices. It's not a neutral expression of views but a targeted campaign message.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>2252869808418948</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, with ad_archive_id "2252869808418948", constitutes electoral propaganda.  It directly refers to a specific political party (PSD), aims to influence voters' choices in the upcoming parliamentary elections, and uses persuasive language and selective presentation of facts to promote PSD while negatively portraying opposing parties. The post's content and objective clearly violate the spirit and likely the letter of Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, especially considering the post's paid nature and wide reach on a public platform.  The post's timing, close to election day, further strengthens this conclusion.  While some factual information is included, the overall presentation lacks journalistic objectivity and is clearly designed to sway voters towards PSD.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>MARCEL CIOALACU</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>PSD</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>USR</name><impact>NEGATIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>PNL</name><impact>NEGATIVE</impact></candidate>

</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PSD</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Laurențiu Marin, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 2252869808418948) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează Partidul Social Democrat (PSD) și candidatul său, Marcel Ciolacu, în mod evident, folosind un limbaj persuasiv și prezentând selectiv informații pentru a influența votul alegătorilor. Postarea, plătită cu o sumă sub 100 RON, a atins o audiență estimată între 100.000 și 500.000 de persoane, conform datelor din Ad Library.  Conținutul postării, care prezintă realizările PSD în contrast cu eșecurile percepute ale altor partide (USR și PNL), are un efect electoral clar, având ca obiectiv influențarea votului în favoarea PSD.  Menționarea explicită a PSD și a lui Marcel Ciolacu, combinată cu îndemnul direct la vot ("Pe 1 Decembrie, votează PSD!"), demonstrează intenția de a influența alegerile parlamentare.  Deși postarea conține unele informații factuale, prezentarea lor este lipsită de obiectivitate jurnalistică, fiind evident concepută pentru a manipula alegătorii.  Contactul advertiserului este laurentiumarin_vn@yahoo.com și +40744666633.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
